mapper.select: SELECT ts.user_id , u.user_nickname , ts.week_number , ts.total_study_time FROM tb_total_study_time ts LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON ts.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND u.user_id = #{user_id} AND ts.week_number = WEEK(CURRENT_DATE, 1) ORDER BY ts.week_number, ts.total_study_time DESC;
